content: lion brand pattern # 20276 *cwe-floralscarf pdf* published in crochet fantasy skill level intermediate wool-ease® article #620 5 colors 1 ball each *shown in gold turquoise fisherman peacock chocolate brown * crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm gauge rounds 1-2 = 2½ inches 6 4 cm square = 6¼ inches 16 9 cm special stitches shell ldc long double_crochet make 9 squares work through round 6 then join together in round 7 as described in pattern alternate color sequences are provided
